name: Harvest Season: Sudoku Puzzle
description:
"A charming and fun new way to play Sudoku. The tiny twists and challenges bring uniqueness and the bubbly music and graphics are delightful." - AppAdvice

Sudoku has changed, forever !

If you love classic sudoku, mixed with innovative puzzle elements, you are in the right place!

Welcome to Harvest Season, the game that will forever change the way you play Sudoku!

Embark on an exciting journey with Abi and her fruit buddies as they travel through a beautifully crafted world and solve addictive puzzles!

Features:

Simple & Addictive: No repeating fruits on any row, column and square.

2x2 Sudoku blends with creative puzzle elements.

Unlock different game episodes with unique gameplay.

Score satisfying combos as you fill different rows, columns, squares.

Compete with friends and players around the world to climb up on the leaderboard.

More episodes coming soon! Stay tune!

Harvest Season is FREE to download and play!

What are you waiting for? Let the journey begin!
